title: Rainbow Six Siege + The Escapist Has to Workout  | Game Night
description:
Nick, KC, Amy and Jesse play Rainbow Six Siege for Game Night. Also, the community trolled Nick into a workout tied to his performance in Rainbow Six Siege.
